participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, she is introspective and enjoys nature.
participant_1.background: i have a pet fish. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. my favorite color is orange.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Caring and dedicated, he is passionate about his family and career.
participant_2.background: i am married to a doctor. my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

content.text: hello! my wife has killed her patient today. Again. And what about you?
